General.Name: Juneyao Airlines
General.Description: Juneyao Airlines Co., Ltd operates air transport business in China. The company offers air passenger, cargo, and mail transportation services, as well as flights to Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, and internationally. As of December 31, 2022, it operates 81 airbus A320 series aircraft. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China. Juneyao Airlines Co., Ltd operates as a subsidiary company of Shanghai Juneyao (Group) Co., Ltd.

4.Name: Mr. Junmin  Xu
4.Title: VP, Sec. of the Board & Director
